content: अप्रतिपत्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Non-performance, non-acceptance. {@--2@} Neglect, omission, disregard. {@--3@} Want of understanding. {@--4@} Absence of determination (what to do), perplexity; °विह्वल &c. <ls>K. 159</ls>; (अप्रतिपत्तिर्जडता स्यादिष्टानिष्टदर्शनश्रुतिभिः); °त्तिसाध्वसजडा <ls>K. 240</ls>; <ls>Ki. 14. 43.</ls> {@--5@} (Hence) absence of mind or ready wit ( स्फूर्त्यभाव); उत्तरस्याप्रतिपत्तिरप्रतिभा <ls>Gaut. S.</ls>
